patthana15.31:4.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.31:5.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.31:6.1: Kenaci viññeyyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakenaci viññeyyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
